title: Floating Notes
detailedDescription: I made Floating Notes in SwiftUI as an alternative to raycast notes but free and open source as I thought $15 was a bit much for a note taking app

title: Quotes that Matter
description: Giving great quotes the attention they deserve
detailedDescription: I made Quotes that Matter as a way to showcase meaningful quotes in an elegant interface. I felt like there was a lack of good quote apps out there and I wanted to make one that was easy to use and looked good.

title: Just $ave It
description: See what you could be worth if you just saved it
detailedDescription: I created Just $ave It as a way to visualize the power of saving money over time with compound interest calculations.

title: Spellcheck
detailedDescription: I made Spellcheck as a simple spellcheck app that uses the OpenAI API to check the spelling of a word. I wanted to make a simple app that was easy to use and looked good.
